files.patch:
@@ -142,1 +142,1 @@
-    BASIC_JVM_LIBS="$BASIC_JVM_LIBS -lpthread"
+    BASIC_JVM_LIBS="$BASIC_JVM_LIBS $LIBPTHREAD"
@@ -200,0 +200,8 @@
+  # Setup posix pthread support
+  if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" != "xwindows"; then
+    LIBPTHREAD="-lpthread"
+  else
+    LIBPTHREAD=""
+  fi
+  AC_SUBST(LIBPTHREAD)
+
